resources.string:
Finding Route

 1. Click on Find Route
 2.Enter Source and Destination. The possible stops will be displayed when three characters are entered in each input section. 3.Click Search Route.

 Path 1:
 Shortest path between the source and destination will be displayed base on public vehicle routes available.
 The path information will include travel transits with available routes, distance and transport fare for each transit and total distance and total fare of transit.
 Path2:
 A single route between source and destination will be displayed if available.
 Each path cah be seperately viewed in map to visualize the path information. 4. Click on [VIEW DEATAIL] to view more details about route. It will display details regarding routes like intermediate stop map view.


Nearby Location
 An alternative is provided to user where the user can select source from (at max. four) nearest stops based on aerial distance between the current location of user and nearby stops. 

Viewing Route Details
 1. Click on View Route
 2. Click on a route from the list
 3. The details of route will be shown in map and each stop name can be viewed by clicking on stop icon.
 Detail Route
 Detail Route will contain two section. 
a. Transit:
 This section will contain detail regarding route. It will show intermediate transit stops and available routes for given transit 
b. Map:
 This section will show display all the transit position in an offline map where user can visualize the route. User can also tap on stop icon to see the stop name.

Travel Fare shown in this app is calculated according to the fare rates provided by DOTM. Local fares may vary. Fares shown in the app should be taken as only reference. Developers do not guarantee the correctness of fare displayed.

यो एपमा देखाइएको यात्राको भाडाहरु यातायात ब्यबस्था बिभागको व्यवस्था अनुसार छ। स्थानिय भाडादर फरक पर्न सक्छ। एपमा देखाइएको यात्राको भाडाहरुलाई जानकारीका रुपमा लिनसकिन्छ । एपको डेभलपरहरु भाडादरको लागी जिम्मेवार छैनन् ।

The “KTM Public Route” is the app which aims to provide the offline route for the users who needs to navigate new places. The main purpose of this app is to provide the overall comfort for any user to browse the different routes along with the transport fares needed for the ride.
It has been developed as Final Year Project in Nepal Engineering College by Sudin Gurung, Sushant Suwal and Som Prasad Shrestha under Supervision of Assistant Professor and Dinesh Dangol and Department of Computer Science and Engineering.



Features:
 - Routes info with distance and vehicle fares
 - Shortest routes prioritized
 - Direct and Alternate routes suggestions
 - GPS for current location (Nearyby Stops)
 - Complete offline Map Integration
 - Simple user friendly interface



If you find any bug in App, Please report it email addresses
 ktmpublicroute@gmail.com

 For more information and updates regarding this app, Please visit official facebook page.
